org.phantomapi.wraith

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.wraith.Audio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Audible

    public class Audio
extends Object
implements Audible
    A collection of audibles which may contain more sub-audibles or actual sound objects. This allows you to create sounds with mixtures of multiple sounds and volumes
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Audio()
      Create an audible object
      Audio(GList<Audible> audibles)
      Create an audible entity with multiple sub-audibles
